definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: It was given forth that the murderer had killed himself.
The murderer was at once apprehended.
So that the governor got rid of the dangerous and the crazy prisoner at the same time?
sentences.chinese: 那麼監獄長倒把兇犯和瘋犯同時擺脫掉了？

sentences.english: The assailant fled down a nearby stairwell.
sentences.chinese: 兇犯趁機逃進了附近的一個樓梯間。

sentences.english: A convicted murderer has broken out of prison.
sentences.chinese: 一名被判謀殺罪的兇犯越獄了。
